Package com.osoc6.OSOC6.util

Class SpelUtil

java.lang.Object
com.osoc6.OSOC6.util.SpelUtil
@Component("spelUtil") public final class SpelUtil extends Object
This class helps with authorization. It's methods can be used in SpEL expressions.

  • Field Summary

    Field

    private String
    webhookToken
    This field is populated by Spring upon startup with the secret webhook token from the properties file.

  • Method Details

    • userEditionsArrayList

      private static ArrayList<Long> userEditionsArrayList(UserEntity userEntity)
      Get all the id's of all of the given user's editions as an array List. This is private since we don't want to export List implementation dependencies.
      Parameters:
      userEntity - the user to get all edition id's of
      Returns:
      a list containing all of the user's editions

    • userEditions

      Returns:
      a list containing all of the user's editions

    • hasOverlappingEditions

      public static Boolean hasOverlappingEditions(UserEntity first, UserEntity second)
      Checks if 2 users can see eachother.
      Parameters:
      first - the first UserEntity that needs to be checked.
      second - the second UserEntity that needs to be checked.
      Returns:
      whether the provided user can see each other

      public static String formatContains(String orig)
      Get a formatted string so LIKE will check if the parameter is contained.
      Parameters:
      orig - ths String parameter for a query that should be formatted
      Returns:
      the formatted string so LIKE will check if the parameter is contained
